name: Audio Tagger
description: Automatically adds audio format tags to movies based on their audio streams (5.1, 7.1, Atmos, DTS, etc.)
overview: Automatic audio tagging plugin for Jellyfin that analyzes movie audio streams and adds descriptive tags based on channel layout, codec, and audio quality.

versions.changelog: Add release workflow with SBOM generation, artifact signing, and enhanced automation
Fix library name matching for libraries with special characters like 'Movies (4k)' - improved case-insensitive and whitespace handling
Initial release - Automatic audio tagging for movies based on stream analysis
